item.title: Applying to AMFOSS open source club
item.description: AMFOSS TASKS # “Success is normally found in a pile of mistakes.” - Tim Fargo If there was ever a point in my life where I felt this quote, it is after I started doing the tasks required for joining the amFOSS club at Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham.
